headline: Is Bank Of America (BAC) Offering A Valuation Opportunity After Its Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: If you are wondering whether Bank of America is offering fair value at its recent share price, this article walks through what the current numbers are actually signaling. The stock last closed at US$51.72, with returns of 13.8% over 1 year, 57.8% over 3 years and 96.8% over 5 years. However, the shorter term picture includes a 2.4% decline over 7 days, an 8.1% decline over 30 days and a 7.6% decline year to date.
